data.eml:eml: Antarctic holothuroids from the Bellingshausen Sea, with descriptions of new species (Echinodermata: Holothuroidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article O’Loughlin, Mark, Manjón-Cabeza, Eugenia, Ruiz, Francina Moya (2009): Antarctic holothuroids from the Bellingshausen Sea, with descriptions of new species (Echinodermata: Holothuroidea). Zootaxa 2016: 1-16, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185959
